name: BlackGuard
description: Rakes who have embraced darker powers and ruthless methods, combining stealth with intimidation and cruelty to achieve their goals while instilling fear in both enemies and allies.

resource_systems.name: Energy
resource_systems.description: Physical energy that powers stealth abilities and brutal strikes
resource_systems.regeneration: 5 per 6 seconds, +8 when inflicting pain or fear
mechanics: Energy points are spent to perform special stealth maneuvers and brutal attacks
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming energy over time
Short rests restore a significant portion of maximum energy
Depleted energy causes penalties to stealth and attack speed
Can be temporarily boosted through adrenaline in critical situations
Inflicting pain and fear on targets restores a portion of energy

resource_systems.name: Cunning
resource_systems.description: Mental acuity and tactical awareness that enhances deception and exploitation of weaknesses
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully using stealth or exploiting vulnerabilities
mechanics: Increases by 20 when successfully exploiting psychological weaknesses
Increases by 25 when using intimidation to control targets
Decreases by 20 when intimidation fails or when tactical plans are foiled
Decreases by 25 when forced to retreat or show weakness
Can be spent to enhance intimidation abilities or execute brutal strikes
Higher Cunning increases the effectiveness of psychological manipulation

resource_systems.name: Infamy
resource_systems.description: Reputation and notoriety that can be leveraged for intimidation and control
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully demonstrating cruelty or ruthless efficiency
mechanics: Increases by 15 when completing operations with brutal efficiency
Increases by 10 when making examples of those who defy you
Decreases by 15 when showing mercy or compassion
Decreases by 10 when reputation is questioned or undermined
Can be spent to intimidate targets into submission or cooperation
Higher Infamy increases the effectiveness of fear-based abilities

resource_systems.name: Dark Power
resource_systems.description: Corrupting energy drawn from dark pacts and forbidden techniques
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when using cruel methods or drawing on dark energies
mechanics: Increases by 15 when performing acts of significant cruelty
Increases by 10 when using forbidden techniques or dark magic
Decreases by 15 when showing mercy or resisting darker impulses
Decreases by 10 when exposed to powerful holy or purifying energies
Can be spent to enhance abilities with dark energy or corrupt targets
At maximum Dark Power, enter a state of terrifying transformation that enhances all abilities

class_mechanics.name: Terrifying Presence
class_mechanics.description: Ability to instill paralyzing fear in targets through presence alone
effects: Can project an aura of dread that weakens the resolve of targets
Able to break the will of captured targets through psychological torture
Can sense fears and insecurities in others with supernatural accuracy
Presence naturally causes unease and anxiety in those nearby
Can establish dominance over others through intimidation and fear

class_mechanics.name: Shadow Corruption
class_mechanics.description: Ability to corrupt and manipulate shadows with dark energy
effects: Can infuse shadows with corrupting energy that damages those who touch them
Able to create tendrils of shadow that restrain or attack targets
Can corrupt light sources, dimming them or extinguishing them entirely
Presence causes shadows to behave unnaturally, moving against light sources
Can temporarily corrupt the shadow of a target, causing pain or controlling movement

class_mechanics.name: Cruel Efficiency
class_mechanics.description: Ruthless approach to operations that prioritizes results over all else
effects: Can identify the most efficient method to break a target's will
Able to execute operations with brutal precision and no hesitation
Can sacrifice allies or innocents without remorse if it serves the mission
Presence intimidates allies into perfect obedience through fear
Can analyze and exploit any weakness, physical or psychological

class_mechanics.name: Dark Pacts
class_mechanics.description: Forbidden agreements with dark entities that grant power at a price
effects: Can draw on dark energies to enhance abilities beyond normal limits
Able to sense and communicate with dark entities and spirits
Can offer sacrifices to dark patrons in exchange for specific boons
Presence attracts minor dark entities that serve as spies and messengers
Can temporarily channel the power of dark patrons for devastating effects

signature_abilities.name: Reign of Terror
signature_abilities.description: Project an overwhelming aura of fear that breaks the will of enemies
mechanics: For 3 minutes, emanate an aura of supernatural dread in a 30-meter radius
Weaker targets flee in terror or become paralyzed with fear
Stronger targets suffer significant penalties to all actions
Allies within the aura gain immunity to fear and bonuses to intimidation
Each target that breaks under fear extends the duration by 10 seconds
Costs 100 Energy, 50 Infamy, and 75 Dark Power

signature_abilities.name: Shadow Torment
signature_abilities.description: Corrupt and control the shadows of targets to inflict pain and control movement
mechanics: Target up to 5 enemies within line of sight
Their shadows become corrupted and partially under your control for 5 minutes
Can inflict pain through the shadows, potentially incapacitating targets
Can partially control the movements of affected targets
Perfect for interrogation, crowd control, or forcing targets into vulnerable positions
Costs 75 Energy, 30 Cunning, and 50 Dark Power

signature_abilities.name: Dark Transformation
signature_abilities.description: Channel dark energies to transform into a terrifying embodiment of fear and shadow
mechanics: For 2 minutes, transform into a nightmarish form of shadow and dark energy
Size increases by 50%, strength and dexterity doubled
Gain the ability to move through shadows at will
Attacks deal additional shadow damage and have a chance to paralyze with fear
Presence alone can cause weaker enemies to flee or surrender
Costs 50 Energy, 100 Dark Power, and 25 Infamy

skill_trees.name: Path of Dread
key_abilities: Breaking Point: Identify and exploit psychological weaknesses to break a target's will
Nightmare Presence: Your mere presence causes debilitating fear in susceptible targets
Reputation of Terror: Your name alone can cause targets to surrender or cooperate

skill_trees.name: Path of Corruption
key_abilities: Shadow Corruption: Infuse shadows with dark energy for various harmful effects
Dark Bargain: Temporarily sacrifice health or resources for tremendous power
Soul Leech: Drain life force from targets to heal yourself and restore resources

skill_trees.name: Path of the Enforcer
key_abilities: Brutal Example: Make an example of a target to terrify others into compliance
Efficient Cruelty: Maximize pain and fear while minimizing effort
Forced Loyalty: Break and rebuild the will of targets to create fanatical servants

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in the Social Manipulator skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Evil alignment for at least 10 levels
challenges: Break the will of a strong-willed target through fear alone
Successfully complete a dark pact with a forbidden entity

legendary_items.name: Dreadlord's Mask
effects: Charisma increased by 5 when intimidating or interrogating
Can see the fears and insecurities of others as visible auras
Reign of Terror cooldown reduced by 8 hours

legendary_items.name: Soulthief Daggers
effects: Attacks drain a portion of the target's life force to heal you
Critical hits have a chance to temporarily steal a portion of the target's abilities
Can be used to carve dark runes that enhance shadow corruption abilities

legendary_items.name: Cloak of Dark Pacts
effects: Dark Power maximum increased by 50
Provides protection from the negative effects of your own dark pacts
Once per day, can summon a minor dark entity to serve you

lore: BlackGuards represent the darkest path a Rake can take, having embraced forbidden powers and ruthless methods to become masters of fear and corruption. These terrifying operatives have transcended ordinary intimidation to develop supernatural abilities that allow them to break the strongest wills and corrupt the purest hearts through a combination of psychological torture and dark magic. The path to becoming a BlackGuard requires not only exceptional stealth and combat skills but also a willingness to form pacts with dark entities and embrace cruelty as a fundamental tool. Those who succeed find themselves capable of inspiring paralyzing fear in even the bravest opponents, controlling others through a perfect understanding of psychological vulnerabilities enhanced by supernatural dread. BlackGuards typically operate as enforcers, interrogators, or assassins for powerful evil organizations, using their unique abilities to maintain control through fear and eliminate those who cannot be controlled. Many establish personal networks of broken individuals who serve out of terror rather than loyalty, creating efficient operations built on fear and intimidation. Some even form their own cults or criminal organizations, using their abilities to establish themselves as nightmarish figures that few dare to oppose. Their combination of stealth, psychological manipulation, and dark powers makes them particularly effective at breaking resistance movements, extracting information, and eliminating troublesome individuals in ways that serve as warnings to others. Though they possess tremendous power, BlackGuards are often bound by the terms of their dark pacts, serving greater evils in exchange for their abilities and potentially sacrificing their own humanity in the pursuit of power and control.
